pici: Ubuntu is not a rolling release, so the 'development release' is the one in-progress that will be released next.
Lucid Lynx/10.04 is due to be released in 2 days, discussion and support in #ubuntu+1.  You may also want to join #ubuntu-bugs if you are interested in bug triaging.
No, just ask in the channel.  If anyone knows the answer they will repond to you.
